duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver content components (UI language, product education, accessibility content etc.) that’s on-brand and meets legal and editorial standards.
Contribute to the structural design of product experience (navigation, labeling, flow).
Lead adherence in content governance and approvals process.
Use and actively contribute to content systems (standards, voice and tone, messaging, and accessibility libraries).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in relevant discipline (e.g., Interaction Design, HCI, English, Rhetoric), certification from credible bootcamp or similar accelerated learning program, or equivalent work experience.
